tool.name: tool_7

param.name: CONTIGUITY
param.dialogReference:
Case of contiguity

Choice

Available Choices:

[0] Rook

[1] Queen

Default: 1

Choose case: Rook's case contiguity compares only cell wich share an edge. Queen's case contiguity compares also cells which share just corners.

tool.summary: Global spatial autocorrelation for grids calculated as Moran's I.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J.
